import {useRef} from 'react' import styles from "./Checkout.module.css" const Checkout = (props) => { //useRef to validate form inputs after submit const nameInputRef = useRef() const streetInputRef = useRef() const postalInputRef = useRef() const cityInputRef = useRef() const confirmHandler = (event) => { event.preventDefault() } return (
) } export default Checkout
